description: Access Figma's powerful API to manage files, comments, and components seamlessly. Enhance your AI assistant's capabilities by integrating Figma functionalities directly into your workflows. Simplify your design collaboration and project management with easy API access.

capabilities.name: set_api_key
capabilities.description: Set your Figma API personal access token (will be saved to ~/.mcp-figma/config.json)

capabilities.name: check_api_key
capabilities.description: Check if a Figma API key is already configured

capabilities.name: get_file
capabilities.description: Get a Figma file by key

capabilities.name: get_file_nodes
capabilities.description: Get specific nodes from a Figma file

capabilities.name: get_image
capabilities.description: Get images for nodes in a Figma file

capabilities.name: get_image_fills
capabilities.description: Get URLs for images used in a Figma file

capabilities.name: get_comments
capabilities.description: Get comments on a Figma file

capabilities.name: post_comment
capabilities.description: Post a comment on a Figma file

capabilities.name: delete_comment
capabilities.description: Delete a comment from a Figma file

capabilities.name: get_team_component_sets
capabilities.description: Get component sets for a team
